question: Which algorithm is available for computing minimal absent words using external memory?

snippets.text: emMAW: computing minimal absent words in external memory.

We present emMAW, the first external-memory algorithm for computing minimal absent words. A free open-source implementation of our algorithm is made available. This allows for computation of minimal absent words on far bigger data sets than was previously possible. Our implementation requires less than 3 h on a standard workstation to process the full human genome when as little as 1 GB of RAM is made available.
We present emMAW, the first external-memory algorithm for computing minimal absent words.
We present emMAW, the first external-memory algorithm for computing minimal absent words.
Results We present emMAW, the first external-memory algorithm for computing minimal absent words.
